info.title: Admin UI Service API
info.description: This Documents gives a detail information on Admin UI Service API

get.summary: Get the healthstatus of the application

200.description: Returns user details if user exists

get.summary: Get SmartLink details in an organisation

parameters.name: org_id
parameters.description: Organisation ID to get all SmartLink

200.description: Returns all SmartLink in an Organisation
Returns 200 status code response if SmartLink details are updated

requestBody.description: Details to create a new SmartLink

200.description: Returns 200 status code response if SmartLink details are deleted

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: SmartLink ID for which configuration is to be fetched

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: SmartLink ID for which connections are to be fetched

200.description: Returns connections in that particular SmartLink

put.summary: Update existing connection or else create new connection for the SmartLink

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: SmartLink ID for which connection is to be updated or created

requestBody.description: Connection details to be updated or created

post.summary: Create new connection for the SmartLink

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: SmartLink ID for which connection is to be created

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: SmartLink ID for which connection is to be deleted

parameters.name: conn_id
parameters.description: Connection ID which is to be deleted

requestBody.description: Organisation and SmartLink ID for which configuration is to be downloaded
Latest installer details which is to be updated

get.summary: Get installer version in particular SmartLink

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: SmartLink ID for which installer version is to be fetched

200.description: Retuns 200 status code if installer version is fetched

put.summary: Updates installer version installed in particular SmartLink

200.description: Retuns 200 status code if installer version is updated

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: SmartLink ID for which status is to be Fetched

200.description: Returns status and last status updatedof the SmartLink

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: SmartLink ID for which status is to be updated

requestBody.description: Organisation, SmartLink ID and status which is to be updated

200.description: Returns 200 status code if status ids updated
Returns 200 status code if EXO Microservice is notified

requestBody.description: Organisation ID and certificate password to generate certificate

200.description: Returns 200 status code if certificate is generated

parameters.name: org_id
parameters.description: Organisation ID for which certificate is to be returned
